summary.span: 表示针对数据库执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型已弃用，并将在 .NET Framework 的未来版本中删除。This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md). 类提供以下方法来针对数据源执行命令：The class provides the following methods for executing commands against a data source: |项Item|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| ||执行返回行的命令。Executes commands that return rows.| ||针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.| ||执行 SQL INSERT、DELETE、UPDATE 和 SET 语句等命令。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||从数据库中检索单个值（例如聚合值）作为 .NET Framework 数据类型。Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as a .NET Framework data type.| ||从数据库中检索单个值（例如，聚合值）作为特定于 Oracle 的数据类型。Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as an Oracle-specific data type.| 可以重置 属性，并重新使用 对象。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 如果执行命令导致严重 ，则 可能会关闭。If execution of the command results in a fatal , the may close. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. > [!NOTE] > 与另一个 .NET Framework 数据提供程序（SQL Server、OLE DB 和 ODBC）中的**命令**对象不同， 对象不支持 属性。Unlike the **Command** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), the object does not support a property. 设置命令超时不起作用，返回的值始终为零。Setting a command timeout has no effect and the value returned is always zero. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 的 方法连同 和 ，从表中选择行。The following example uses the method of , along with and , to select rows from a table. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 尝试取消执行 。

span.span: Attempts to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有要取消的内容，则不会执行任何操作。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens. 但是，如果有正在执行的命令，则即使取消尝试失败，也不会生成异常。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，执行该操作，然后取消执行。The following example creates an , executes it, then cancels the execution. 为实现此目的，向方法传递了一个字符串，该字符串是一个 SQL SELECT 语句和一个用于连接数据库的字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置针对数据库执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the database.

value.span: 要执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时， 属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 如果存储过程名称包含任何特殊字符，则可能需要用户使用转义符语法。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 在调用执行方法之一时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. 用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持问号（？）占位符，以便将参数传递给 `CommandType.Text`的 调用的 SQL 语句。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用命名参数。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如:For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 使用 `CommandType.Text`的 调用的 SQL 语句中的命名参数时，必须在参数名称前面加上冒号（:)。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 但是，在存储过程中，或在代码中的其他位置引用命名参数时（例如，将 对象添加到 属性时），不要在命名参数前面加上冒号（:)。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). 用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序自动提供冒号。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果分配的 属性值小于0，则将生成 。An is generated if the assigned property value is less than 0.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示如何解释 属性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the property is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时，应将 属性设置为完整的 Oracle call 语法。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the full Oracle call syntax. 然后，命令在调用 Execute 方法之一时（例如 或 ）执行此存储过程。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). 如果当前连接正在执行执行或提取操作，则不能设置 、 和 属性。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持问号（？）占位符，以便将参数传递给 `CommandType.Text`的 调用的 SQL 语句。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用命名参数。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如:For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 使用 `CommandType.Text`的 调用的 SQL 语句中的命名参数时，必须在参数名称前面加上冒号（:)。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 但是，在存储过程中，或在代码中的其他位置引用命名参数时（例如，将 对象添加到 属性时），不要在命名参数前面加上冒号（:)。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). 用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序自动提供冒号。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例 创建派生类的实例并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an instance of a derived class and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the used by this instance of the .
The connection to a data source.
The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前连接正在执行执行或提取操作，则不能设置 、和 属性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 如果在事务执行过程中设置了 ，并且 属性不为 null，则会生成 。If you set while a transaction is in progress and the property is not null, an is generated. 如果在提交或回滚事务后将 设置为，并且 属性不为 null，则 属性将设置为 null 值。If you set after the transaction has been committed or rolled back, and the property is not null, the property is then set to a null value. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: 对于 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 语句，返回值为 0。

span.span: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.

returns.span: 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 来执行目录操作（例如，查询数据库的结构或创建表等数据库对象）;或者，通过执行 UPDATE、INSERT 或 DELETE 语句来更改数据库中的数据，而不使用 。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 尽管 不返回任何行，但映射到参数的任何输出参数或返回值都是用数据填充的。Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 对于 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 语句，返回值为 0。For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0. 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 如果发生回滚，则返回值也为-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后使用 执行它。The following example creates an and then executes it by using . 该示例向传递了一个字符串，该字符串是 SQL 语句（如 UPDATE、INSERT 或 DELETE）以及用于连接数据库的字符串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement (such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE) and a string to use to connect to the database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 ExecuteOracleNonQuery([out] valuetype System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString& rowid) cil managed
Public Function ExecuteOracleNonQuery (ByRef rowid As OracleString) As Integer

param.name: rowid
param.span: 服务器中实际行 ID 的 base64 字符串表示形式。

span.span: A base64 string representation of the actual row ID in the server.

summary.span: 针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: 对于 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 语句，返回值为 0。

span.span: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.

returns.span: 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 来执行目录操作（例如，查询数据库的结构或创建表等数据库对象）;或者，通过执行 UPDATE、INSERT 或 DELETE 语句来更改数据库中的数据，而不使用 。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 与 的不同之处在于，如果执行的 INSERT、DELETE 或 UPDATE 语句只影响一行，则它会返回 `rowid` 作为输出参数。 differs from in that it returns `rowid` as an output parameter if you are executing an INSERT, DELETE, or UPDATE statement that affects exactly one row. 这使您可以唯一地标识 Oracle 数据库中的行，从而使您可以在后续的相关查询中提高性能。This allows you to uniquely identify a row in the Oracle database, which can allow you to increase performance in subsequent, related queries. 尽管 不返回任何行，但映射到参数的任何输出参数或返回值都是用数据填充的。Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object ExecuteOracleScalar() cil managed

summary.span: 执行查询，并将查询返回的结果集中第一行的第一列作为 Oracle 特定的数据类型返回。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as an Oracle-specific data type.

summary.span: 忽略其他列或行。

span.span: Extra columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 结果中第一行的第一列会被设置为特定于 Oracle 的数据类型，或者，如果结果为 ，则为 null 引用。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set as an Oracle-specific data type, or a null reference if the result is a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以从数据库中检索单个值（例如聚合值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 这需要比使用 方法更少的代码，然后执行必要的操作，以便根据 返回的数据生成单个值。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an . 典型 查询的格式如下所C#示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` command.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) AS NumberOfRegions FROM Region"; count = command.ExecuteOracleScalar(); ```

summary.span: 将 发送到 并生成一个 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时， 属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 然后，在调用 时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call . 在任意给定时间，都可以打开多个 。More than one can be open at any given time. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后通过传递作为 SQL SELECT 语句的字符串以及用于连接到数据源的字符串来执行它。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你希望 SQL 语句仅返回一行，则指定 `SingleRow` 作为 值可能会提高应用程序性能。If you expect your SQL statement to return only a single row, specifying `SingleRow` as the value may improve application performance. 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时， 属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 然后，在调用 时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call . 支持一种特殊模式，该模式允许有效读取较大的二进制值。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 有关详细信息，请参阅 的 `SequentialAccess` 设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 在任意给定时间，都可以打开多个 。More than one can be open at any given time. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后通过传递一个字符串（一个 SQL SELECT 语句）和一个用于连接到数据库的字符串来执行它。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the database. 然后，将 设置为 。 is then set to . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteReader2/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteReader2/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 执行查询，并将查询返回的结果集中第一行的第一列作为 .NET Framework 数据类型返回。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as a .NET Framework data type.

summary.span: 忽略其他列或行。

span.span: Extra columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: .NET Framework 数据类型形式的结果集第一行的第一列；如果结果集为空或结果为 ，则为 null 引用。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set as a .NET Framework data type, or a null reference if the result set is empty or the result is a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以从数据库中检索单个值（例如聚合值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 这需要比使用 方法更少的代码，然后执行必要的操作，以便根据 返回的数据生成单个值。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an . 典型 查询的格式如下所C#示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Region"; Int32 count = (int32) ExecuteScalar(); ``` ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后使用 执行它。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 该示例向传递了一个字符串，该字符串是返回聚合结果的 SQL 语句和用于连接数据库的字符串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OracleParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取 。

value.span: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时， 属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 如果存储过程名称包含任何特殊字符，则可能需要用户使用转义符语法。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 在调用执行方法之一时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. 用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持问号（？）占位符，以便将参数传递给 `CommandType.Text`的 调用的 SQL 语句。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用命名参数。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如:For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 使用 `CommandType.Text`的 调用的 SQL 语句中的命名参数时，必须在参数名称前面加上冒号（:)。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 但是，在存储过程中，或在代码中的其他位置引用命名参数时（例如，将 对象添加到 属性时），不要在命名参数前面加上冒号（:)。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). 用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序自动提供冒号。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并显示其参数。The following example creates an and displays its parameters. 为实现此目的，将向方法传递一个 、一个 SQL SELECT 语句和一个 对象的数组。To accomplish this, the method is passed an , a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and an array of objects. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用 之前，请在要准备的语句中指定每个参数的数据类型。Before you call , specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在其中执行 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the within which the executes.
The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性已设置为特定值，并且命令正在执行过程中，则不能设置此属性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果将 transaction 属性设置为不与 对象连接到相同 的 对象，则在您下次尝试执行语句时将引发异常。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception will be thrown the next time you attempt to execute a statement.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 方法如何将命令结果应用到 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the method should apply command results to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 值为 `Both`，除非自动生成命令（与 的情况相同），在这种情况下，默认值为 `None`。The default value is `Both` unless the command is automatically generated (as in the case of the ), in which case the default is `None`. 有关使用 属性的详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about using the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).

exception.span: 输入的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value entered was not one of the values.
